name: Spicy Baked Picnic Chicken
author: Crystal S
summary: Wonderful baked chicken with a spicy twist! Your taste buds will love it!
ingredients: 1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix, divided
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Spray a broiler pan with cooking spray
Whisk buttermilk, 1 teaspoon  , and cayenne pepper together in a bowl
Mix remaining taco seasoning, bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese, flour, onion powder, salt, and black pepper together in a separate bowl
Dip chicken in buttermilk mixture; coat with bread crumbs mixture
Place coated chicken in broiler pan
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is longer pink in the center and coating is crispy, 30 to 35 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
